actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to determining the amount of a supplemental grant under the emergency relief program regarding the human immunodeficiency virus.
short_title: HIV Emergency Supplemental Grants Amendments of 1993

summary.text: HIV Emergency Supplemental Grants Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide that: (1) the amount of supplemental grant under the emergency relief program regarding human immunodeficiency virus health care services shall be primarily based on the need of the eligible area for such a grant as indicated by the information provided in the application; and (2) an eligible area that desires to receive such a grant shall include within information to be submitted to the Secretary of Health and Human Services the cumulative number of cases reported and confirmed.

titles.title: HIV Emergency Supplemental Grants Amendments of 1993
To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to determining the amount of a supplemental grant under the emergency relief program regarding the human immunodeficiency virus.
